name: Criminal's Testimony
desc: Criminal testimonies compiled by Morgane. They record the results of today's interrogation.

value.text:
Sigewinne's Story Quest
Nereides Chapter: Act I - The Warmth of Lies
Quest - Switcheroo

desc.text:
Potton:
Who's this Potton? I'm Honore! I had applied to go out and see a doctor, but when I woke up, I was in another cell! Unbelievable!
Gascon:
I'm not Gascon, I'm Houilles! Today should've been the final day of my sentence, so I should've gone free. What gives!?
Enri:
I'm Erick! Why does stuff like this always happen to me? Now there's no way my release papers are getting squared away today...
Lazare:
My name is Odilon! I'm a Garde! I think I was attacked... This isn't me at all!
...
